name: Hector
insights: Hector has the highest <abbr title="Defense">DEF</abbr> potential possible among Axe heroes.
Hector has the highest <abbr title="Defense">DEF</abbr> potential possible among Green heroes.
description: Eliwood's friend and brother of the Marquess of Ostia. Wants to win the big tournament. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

dialogue.text: I'm Hector. Huh? You didn't summon me here hoping for a gift, did you?
So your world has a festival that celebrates love too, huh? What kind of people would win your world's tournament?
You're wasting your time if you came to me for gift-giving advice. What I have to share on that matter could hardly be classified as "advice."
I don't know if it's because of the festival or what, but... Does everyone seem a bit rowdy to you?
There's a whole row of stalls in town selling all sorts of treats. And they all look mighty sweet to me. But the only treat I need is a good tournament!
Eliwood and I used to spar all the time. He's not as sturdy as I am, but he still gave me a run for my money!
I've got a gift for you, from <Friend Name>. But if you don't want it... I'll take it.
Victory at the tournament will be mine!
Can't lose focus just because it's festival time.
Maybe I'm getting a little ahead of myself here...
Guess I need to return the favor. So, uh... What do you want?

Gift giving isn't really my thing, but I know a good gift can show someone how grateful you are to them. So I guess that means I should hand some out... I'll get something for my daughter Lilina, and for Eliwood. But I never know what to say when I hand over a gift. It's always just kind of...embarrassing... Say, <Player Name>... Why don't you help me come up with something? I'm really hopeless here. You'll do it? Great! I owe you big time! Heh, guess that means I'll have to get something for you, too.
